name: Express Oh!
description:
Put your frenzied barista skills to the test! Start brewing coffee and espresso in this exciting memory game!

FEATURES:

- Play quick sessions of 60 to 120 seconds brewing coffees for your lovely customers.

- Increase you Coffee Shop Reputation and attempt to reach Level 50! As your shop reputation increases, the number of clients and the complexity of their orders will increase!

- Build more coffee machines and upgrade them to process more orders at once and keep your customers happy!

- Earn Coffee Bucks to personalize the look of your coffee shop. Wallpapers, coffee machines or straight up decorations, you can mix and match to get the perfect coffee shop that will suit your taste!

- Use power-ups to help you during your shift at the coffee shop. Purchase premium quality beans and add a flavor of the month to make more profits or hire new employees to help with your operations!

- Link your Account with Facebook, Twitter or Google to save your data and access it on any device!

Note: Offline play is available. No Internet connection is required.

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/bootjetgames/
